decision_conditions: The proposed enlargement of the wraparound extension by reason of its scale and depth would constitute in a bulky, incongruous and over dominant development harming the character and appearance of the locality and the host building. The development would therefore fail to comply with the NPPF (2023), policies D4 of the London Plan (2021), and policies 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed enlargement of the wraparound extension by reason of its unneighbourly depth, bulk and mass would result in harmful impacts in terms of overdominance, loss of light and overshadowing to the detriment of the residential amenities of the neighbouring property No. 11 Laughton Road, contrary to the Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan 2021, Policies 1.1 (e) (i) and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), Policy 5.10 Ealing Local Variation, and policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey rear extension; installation of two windows to side elevation; front porch extension (following demolition of existing front porch)
